title: Ep. 192 - The Mummy Returns with Katee Robert!
itunes:title: Ep. 192 - The Mummy Returns with Katee Robert!
description:
Hey HBs, KATEE ROBERT is back! We're talking all about her newest release https://www.kateerobert.com/neon-gods (Neon Gods) (a smoking hot Hades and Persephone retelling complete with BOASTFUL FLOORS) and recapping The Mummy Returns! 
 Bonus Content: The Rock before acting classes, those foxy dog heads, all that child endangerment and neglect, sand castle masterpieces, the real life sexy quotient of a falconer, the glory-hole of ancient Egypt, that CGI scorpion eyebrow, and so much more! 
 Lady Loves: 
 Mel: scener.com for watch parties with any streaming platform! 
 Katee: The Calm app has sleep stories that are SO RELAXING. 
 Follow Katee on all the socials: Twitter, Instagram, Tik Tok, Facebook
 Our PATREON fundraiser supporting https://www.imreadymovement.org/ (AAPI Women Lead) is still going until June 10th! We'll double all new and increased pledges and help uplift Asian American and Pacific Islander women! 
 Episode Sponsor: Historical Romance Retreat (Sept. 28-Oct 2, 2022)
 Subscribe! Rate! Review! Tell all your friends :)
 Get more content on
 Sign up for our Newsletter! 
 MERCH! Teepublic, https://chicalookate.myshopify.com/collections/heaving-bosom (Chicaloo Kate), Redbubble
 Make your life better and hire Natalie to assist you!!!
 And follow our socials: 
 Instagram: @heavingbosoms
 Twitter: @heaving_bosoms
  Facebook
  
Mentioned in this episode:
September in the Temple!
- This month we're back with Katee regaling us with more Fertile in My Ex-Boyfriend’s Dungeon (and we discover an actual hard limit for Katee!), and Hannah Whitten is going to stop by to give us all her best spooky season recs. 
- In Book Club news, everyone in the Joy Bringer and Celebrant tiers can download their ebooks of MY WICKED PRINCE by Molly O’Keefe and the entire audiobook collection of COURT OF THE VAMPIRE QUEEN by Katee Robert! 
- And finally, Joy Bringers and Celebrants can check out all the digital art we’ve created for the Temple! It’s all on one convenient page waiting for you. 
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/temple (Bonkers Temple of Defiant Joy! )
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
July 2022 Bonkers Book Club! 
Join the Temple of Defiant Joy! July 2022 is offering you: the box set of Nicola Davidson's Surrey SFS series, Brutal Prince by Sophie Lark, and AUDIOBOOK Obsession by K. Lorrainne and Meg Anne, duet narration performed by Stella Hunter, Shane East, Aaron Shedlock, JF Harding, Jason Clarke, and James Joseph.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/bbc (Bonkers Book Club!)
content:encoded:
Hey HBs, KATEE ROBERT is back! We're talking all about her newest release Neon Gods (a smoking hot Hades and Persephone retelling complete with BOASTFUL FLOORS) and recapping The Mummy Returns! 

Bonus Content: The Rock before acting classes, those foxy dog heads, all that child endangerment and neglect, sand castle masterpieces, the real life sexy quotient of a falconer, the glory-hole of ancient Egypt, that CGI scorpion eyebrow, and so much more! 

Lady Loves: 

Mel: scener.com for watch parties with any streaming platform! 

Katee: The Calm app has sleep stories that are SO RELAXING. 

Follow Katee on all the socials: Twitter, Instagram, Tik Tok, Facebook

Our PATREON fundraiser supporting AAPI Women Lead is still going until June 10th! We'll double all new and increased pledges and help uplift Asian American and Pacific Islander women! 

Episode Sponsor: Historical Romance Retreat (Sept. 28-Oct 2, 2022)

Mentioned in this episode:

September in the Temple!

- This month we're back with Katee regaling us with more Fertile in My Ex-Boyfriend’s Dungeon (and we discover an actual hard limit for Katee!), and Hannah Whitten is going to stop by to give us all her best spooky season recs. - In Book Club news, everyone in the Joy Bringer and Celebrant tiers can download their ebooks of MY WICKED PRINCE by Molly O’Keefe and the entire audiobook collection of COURT OF THE VAMPIRE QUEEN by Katee Robert! - And finally, Joy Bringers and Celebrants can check out all the digital art we’ve created for the Temple! It’s all on one convenient page waiting for you.

Bonkers Temple of Defiant Joy!

Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!

This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone. You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more! Tiers include: - Cinnamon Roll - $114.99 - The Alpha - - $169.99 Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022! Lorrainne and Meg Anne, duet narration performed by Stella Hunter, Shane East, Aaron Shedlock, JF Harding, Jason Clarke, and James Joseph.

Bonus Content: The Rock before acting classes, those foxy dog heads, all that child endangerment and neglect, the real life sexy quotient of a falconer, the glory-hole of ancient Egypt, that CGI scorpion eyebrow, and so much more!
